ModMetaData.name: [HH][Facial Animation] Xenohumans Expanded
ModMetaData.author: HohenHeizen
ModMetaData.description:
Patch adding Facial Animation support to Xenohuman Expanded. --- Contains: • Glitterworlder - Variant for Male and Female Head/Default Ears • Lo-Gravver - Default Head/Ears • Vatdrone - Default Head/Ears • Gravity dwarf - Default Head/Ears • Radworlder - Variant for Male and Female Head/No Ears or Eyebrows
Todo: More custom heads? Hm.
Version <color=#FFD800>1.2.0</color>
